name: @ANATICOR
author: AFNI Developers
description: Script to produce a residual time series cleaned by ANATICOR model

inputs.name: TimeSeriesVol
inputs.description: Time series volume which should have already undergone preprocessing steps such as despiking, RetroIcor, RVT correction, time shifting, and volume registration.

inputs.name: polort
inputs.description: Polynomial for linear trend removal. Use the same order as for afni_proc.py

inputs.name: motion
inputs.description: Head motion parameters from 3dvolreg, also created by afni_proc.py

inputs.name: aseg
inputs.description: Aseg file from FreeSurfer's segmentation. This aseg volume must be in register with the EPI time series.

inputs.name: output
inputs.description: Use output (residual time series) for a prefix

inputs.name: radius
inputs.description: The radius of a local sphere mask in mm. Default is 15 mm for high resolution 1.7x1.7x3mm data.

inputs.name: view
inputs.description: Set the view of the output data. Default is +orig. Choose from +orig, +acpc, or +tlrc.

inputs.name: nuisance
inputs.description: Other nuisance regressors. Each regressor is a column in .1D file

inputs.name: Rsq_WMe
inputs.description: Produce an explained variance map for WMeLOCAL regressor.

inputs.name: coverage
inputs.description: Produce a spatial coverage map of WMeLOCAL regressor

inputs.name: echo
inputs.description: Echo each script command for debugging

output-files.description: Output files with the prefix specified by the -prefix option.
output-files.name: Output Files
